parameters.name: id
parameters.remarks: A cryptocurrency or fiat currency by CoinMarketCap ID to list market pairs for. Example: "1"

parameters.name: slug
parameters.remarks: Alternatively pass a cryptocurrency by slug. Example: "bitcoin"

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.remarks: Alternatively pass a cryptocurrency by symbol. Fiat currencies are not supported by this field. Example: "BTC". A single cryptocurrency "id", "slug", *or* "symbol" is required.

parameters.name: start
parameters.remarks: Optionally offset the start (1-based index) of the paginated list of items to return.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.remarks: Optionally specify the number of results to return. Use this parameter and the "start" parameter to determine your own pagination size.

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.remarks: Optionally specify the sort direction of markets returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.remarks: Optionally specify the sort order of markets returned. By default we return a strict sort on 24 hour reported volume. Pass `cmc_rank` to return a CMC methodology based sort where markets with excluded volumes are returned last.

parameters.name: aux
parameters.remarks: Optionally specify a comma-separated list of supplemental data fields to return. Pass `num_market_pairs,category,fee_type,market_url,currency_name,currency_slug,price_quote,notice` to include all auxiliary fields.

parameters.name: matched_id
parameters.remarks: Optionally include one or more fiat or cryptocurrency IDs to filter market pairs by. For example `?id=1&matched_id=2781` would only return BTC markets that matched: "BTC/USD" or "USD/BTC". This parameter cannot be used when `matched_symbol` is used.

parameters.name: matched_symbol
parameters.remarks: Optionally include one or more fiat or cryptocurrency symbols to filter market pairs by. For example `?symbol=BTC&matched_symbol=USD` would only return BTC markets that matched: "BTC/USD" or "USD/BTC". This parameter cannot be used when `matched_id` is used.

parameters.name: category
parameters.remarks: The category of trading this market falls under. Spot markets are the most common but options include derivatives and OTC.

parameters.name: fee_type
parameters.remarks: The fee type the exchange enforces for this market.

parameters.name: convert
parameters.remarks: Optionally calculate market quotes in up to 120 currencies at once by passing a comma-separated list of cryptocurrency or fiat currency symbols. Each additional convert option beyond the first requires an additional call credit. A list of supported fiat options can be found [here](#section/Standards-and-Conventions). Each conversion is returned in its own "quote" object.

parameters.name: convert_id
parameters.remarks: Optionally calculate market quotes by CoinMarketCap ID instead of symbol. This option is identical to `convert` outside of ID format. Ex: convert_id=1,2781 would replace convert=BTC,USD in your query. This parameter cannot be used when `convert` is used.
